ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... heh i also find it amusing people come out and say I will NEVER buy another Verant game! and then in the next sentence they say well i will probly try
ygData.messageBody:
>
>I have decided not to quit simply because of my friends in my guild and on
>my server. I have little to no respect for Verant in the regards of
>customer service and understanding the dynamic of the game they created.
>
>While I will continue to pay my $10/month - I will probably never buy
>another game from them.
>
>Just my two cents!
>
>Slyde


heh i also find it amusing people come out and say ''I will NEVER buy another Verant
game!'' and then in the next sentence they say well i will probly try star wars online, heh.
and out of all the people who say this kind of stuff, if your friends from EQ buy EQ2 and
spend a lot of time playing it, you won't join them? how would that be any different than
paying 10 bucks per month now?
